page.title: 16Social Concerns
page.content: What are the people of Bradford most concerned about? Traffic, unemployment, vandalism, education, T.V., housing or nuclear war? Many people are worried about traffic damaging our town. Heavy lorries thunder through our narrow streets and grind up our steep hills. Exhaust fumes belch into our atmosphere and erode the fabric of our buildings. Most grown ups are preoccupied by keeping their families well housed, well fed, well dressed and happy. They are very concerned about earning enough money to do this. Most families, especially the children, spend most of their time watching television. Sometimes parents split up and families reorganise themselves. Young people are very worried about employment and whether they will be able to get a job or not.
